fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce

Interface ParallelMapReduceCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, MapReduceCI, MapReduceI, MapReduceSyncCI, MapReduceSyncI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, ParallelMapReduceI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI

    public interface ParallelMapReduceCI
extends ParallelMapReduceI, MapReduceCI
    The component interface ParallelMapReduceCI defines the parallel map and reduce services over the DHT.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2025-03-19

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.ParallelMapReduceI

        ParallelMapReduceI.ParallelismPolicyI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <R extends java.io.Serializable>
      void      		 parallelMap(java.lang.String computationURI, SelectorI selector, ProcessorI<R> processor, ParallelMapReduceI.ParallelismPolicyI parallelismPolicy)
      map the processor computation over the entries in the DHT that passes the selector test, doing this in parallel among the nodes under the control of the parallelPolicy.
      <A extends java.io.Serializable,R,I extends MapReduceResultReceptionCI>
      void      		 parallelReduce(java.lang.String computationURI, ReductorI<A,R> reductor, CombinatorI<A> combinator, A identityAcc, A currentAcc, ParallelMapReduceI.ParallelismPolicyI parallelismPolicy, fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI<I> caller)
      asynchronously reduce the results of type R from a previously executed map with URI computationURI using an accumulator of type A; reductor is the function that computes a new accumulator value from the previous one and a map result while combinator is the function that computes a new accumulator value from two previous accumulator values; the reduction is performed in parallel among the nodes under the control of the parallelPolicy.

      • Methods inherited from interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.MapReduceCI

        map, reduce

      • Methods inherited from interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.MapReduceSyncCI

        clearMapReduceComputation, mapSync, reduceSync

    • Method Detail

      • parallelMap

        <R extends java.io.Serializable> void parallelMap(java.lang.String computationURI,
                                                  SelectorI selector,
                                                  ProcessorI<R> processor,
                                                  ParallelMapReduceI.ParallelismPolicyI parallelismPolicy)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ParallelMapReduceI
        map the processor computation over the entries in the DHT that passes the selector test, doing this in parallel among the nodes under the control of the parallelPolicy.

        Contract

         pre     computationURI != null && !computationURI.isEmpty()
 pre     selector != null
 pre     processor != null
 pre     parallelPolicy != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        parallelMap in interface ParallelMapReduceI
        Type Parameters:
        R - type of the results of the map computation.
        Parameters:
        computationURI - URI of the computation, used to distinguish parallel maps over the same DHT.
        selector - a boolean function that selects the entries in the DHT that will be processed by the map.
        processor - a function implementing the processing to be mapped itself.
        parallelismPolicy - parallelism policy controlling the way a call to a node spans into several parallel calls on more than one following nodes in the DHT ring.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        See Also:
        ParallelMapReduceI.parallelMap(java.lang.String, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.SelectorI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.ProcessorI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.ParallelMapReduceI.ParallelismPolicyI)

      • parallelReduce

        <A extends java.io.Serializable,R,I extends MapReduceResultReceptionCI> void parallelReduce(java.lang.String computationURI,
                                                                                            ReductorI<A,R> reductor,
                                                                                            CombinatorI<A> combinator,
                                                                                            A identityAcc,
                                                                                            A currentAcc,
                                                                                            ParallelMapReduceI.ParallelismPolicyI parallelismPolicy,
                                                                                            fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI<I> caller)
                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ParallelMapReduceI
        asynchronously reduce the results of type R from a previously executed map with URI computationURI using an accumulator of type A; reductor is the function that computes a new accumulator value from the previous one and a map result while combinator is the function that computes a new accumulator value from two previous accumulator values; the reduction is performed in parallel among the nodes under the control of the parallelPolicy.

        Contract

         pre     computationURI != null && !computationURI.isEmpty()
 pre     reductor != null
 pre     combinator != null
 pre     parallelPolicy != null
 pre     callerNode != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        parallelReduce in interface ParallelMapReduceI
        Type Parameters:
        A - type of the accumulator.
        R - type of the map results.
        I - type of the result reception component interface.
        Parameters:
        computationURI - URI of the computation, used to distinguish parallel maps over the same DHT.
        reductor - function A x R -> A accumulating one map result.
        combinator - function A x A -> A combining two accumulators.
        identityAcc - the identity accumulator value i.e., reducing or combining any value v with this value returns v.
        currentAcc - the previously accumulated value.
        parallelismPolicy - parallelism policy controlling the way a call to a node spans into several parallel calls on more than one following nodes in the DHT ring.
        caller - an end point where to forward the final accumulator after all reductions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        See Also:
        ParallelMapReduceI.parallelReduce(java.lang.String, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.ReductorI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.CombinatorI, java.io.Serializable, java.io.Serializable, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.ParallelMapReduceI.ParallelismPolicyI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPointI)
